mapper.select: SELECT REPLACE(UUID(), '-', '') id, SUM(a.sales_count) sales_count, SUM(a.sales_amount) sales_amount, a.order_day, a.device_id FROM report_base a WHERE a.order_day=#{orderDay} GROUP BY a.device_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO report_base ( id, device_id, goods_code, sales_count, sales_amount, order_day, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.deviceId}, #{item.goodsCode}, #{item.salesCount}, #{item.salesAmount}, #{item.orderDay}, #{item.createBy}, now(), #{item.updateBy}, now() )
